# Before opening a pull request

From the top-level of this repository, run:

- \[ \] `pre-commit run --all-files`
- \[ \] `pylint --recursive=y --rcfile=.pylintrc .`. All warnings but `fixme` must be addressed.

# To merge

- \[ \] `Squash & Merge`
